title: Emerald Archer: The Hood and the Rise of Vigilantism
description: Does the law have to be broken to uphold it? In December 2018, the Star City Police Department answered that question when they deputized Oliver Queen, the vigilante known as the Green Arrow.
quote: If the police can’t protect the people, then the people need to learn how to protect themselves.
alt1: Starling City police detective Quentin Lance
